author: bloritsch
msg: Fix some minor pooling bugs.  Hard Resource Limiting pool now checks to see if
there is enough room to grow its resources before it tries.  This eliminates any noise
in the logs due to ignorable exceptions when the pool tries to grow by 2 or more and
there is only room for 1.  Also removed wait in datasource testcase

author: bloritsch
msg: Change DataSourceTestCase to use ExcaliburTestCase.  As a result fix an error.

author: bloritsch
msg: Serious hackery to make ExcaliburTestCase run one (1) time, and maintain
